abilities.name: Pounce
abilities.description: Deals 50% AD damage and has a 47% chance to stun the target for 2 turns.

abilities.name: Thick Fur
abilities.description: Increases Armor and Magic Shield by 20 for 10 turns.

abilities.name: Bunny Bounce
abilities.description: If used on an ally: Redirects all damage the ally would receive to Farmer Alice for 5 turns. If used on an enemy: Deals 600% of Magic Shield as physical damage.

abilities.name: Carrot Power Up
abilities.description: Heals the target for 27% of missing health (minimum 2% of max HP) and reduces target's active cooldowns by 5 turns. Cooldown reduces by 1 turn when Alice takes damage.

passive.name: Magical Resistance
passive.description: When hit by magical damage, permanently gains 2 Magic Shield.
